PATH_ROOT = '/Applications/MAMP/htdocs/'¶
XXXgetCmsPath()¶
getRootPath()¶
getStylePath(component)¶

Answer the relative local path to the CSS file.

getTemplatePath(component)¶

Answer the relative local oath to the template of <b>component</b>.

page(component)¶
save(theme, path=None, makeDirectory=True)¶

Create all necessery Kirby directories. Then call the CssBuilder and HtmlBuilder to generate the site files. Note that the special PHP syntax in the HTML output is entirely caused by the KirbyAdapter, generating the PHP code instead of fixed content.

setRootPath(path)¶
snippet(component, name)¶

Allows inheriting (PHP) classes to save the block code to another snippet file, by redefining this method. Default behavior is to do nothing

theme(component)¶
